review: I really enjoy the Amazon Fire stick,  but will admit it is frustrating that another cable must be plugged into the wall,  unlike Chromecast and it's ability to use the TV USB port as a power source.The apps work well and overall,  I enjoy it. I've had to plug and unplug the device a few times for the display to turn back on.
author: Jason Randall

review: Got this at Christmas and like it a lot. If you are a Prime subscriber I think you will enjoy what it offers.
author: Tony R. Brackett

review: lots of good content, streams well
author: ben davis

review: The fire stick was a great  investment for me and a great gift for my family. Love the setup tutorial as well as the menu.
author: Terry James

review: Everything I expected and more.  My entire family is addicted, a must have for any prime member and you cannot beat the price.
author: Andy Schneiter
